website_summaries.verdict: A soothing thermal-spring water spray that hydrates skin and eases the discomfort of common skin conditions.
pros: Soothes and softens skin while working to minimize skin sensitivity
Eases discomfort for those with skin conditions
Great for all skin types, as it doesn't irritate skin
cons: There have been some complaints about the cap falling off and the spray nozzle clogging up

customer_reviews.title: It's really just water, but it's good?
customer_reviews.text: It's stupid, but I love it. Good for long flights and refreshing your face during the day at work. I first got this as a free sample in Birchbox and it came with a completely incomprehensible pamphlet about how the water is special water from France. People say it's softening? I don't know, it feels nice, and I have an absurd fondness for it.
customer_reviews.author: jonez

customer_reviews.title: Feels soooooo good.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I'd give it more stars if possible. I had scalp psoriasis and this helps more than any oil or cream I've ever used including prescriptions. I section my hair off and spray it onto my scalp. Honestly it's like automatic relief from the itching and burning. It doesn't make it goi away or anything but boy does it feel wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: It seems to calm and refresh my skin and it also feels amazing. I use it as a toner
customer_reviews.text: I know this seems ridiculous, but I promise, it is not. It seems to calm and refresh my skin and it also feels amazing. I use it as a toner. First, I wash my face using Avene cleanser (the blue one), I spray this on and let it dry, and then I use the Embryolisse lait-creme concentre moisturizer. It is a perfect skin care routine that works and is actually a lot less expensive than most other alternatives. Try it. I bet you will be pleasantly surprised. One small thing to bear in mind is that this is a large container; it didn't fit in my medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aerosol spray did not work! NO RETURNS.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the bottle I was sent barely worked upon arrival and got worse within a few days. It is a full bottle but nothing comes out. It is a non returnable item so I’m stuck with a full bottle that was $20. I’m SO bummed. Possibly because of the pressure in the aerosol? I would recommend purchasing this product in a store if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Eczema
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything to help my sons eczema and nothing helped except for the Avene products! Im using the the Extremely, Xeracalm, Recovery and Thermal spring. Four products and within 2 days the redness went away! His skin is actually starting to heal!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he has very sensitive neck. Every time he shaves he would always get bumps all over his neck. He has tried different moisturizers, shavers, shaving cream, etc. and nothing help. A friend gave us a sample of this from her Ipsy bag and the first time he used it after shaving there was a huge difference. The bumps completely went away, and now he uses this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down the best spring water mist. I used to use Evian for years and there’s no comparison. Even La Roche-Posay’s thermal face mist pales in comparison. I use this mist to keep my skin damp between the shower and when I apply my skincare. This process absolutely helps keep my skin hydrated. It’s also nice to keep a bottle on my bedside table to mist myself at night or in the morning. Refreshing, hydrating, and cooling.
customer_reviews.author: CDNYC

customer_reviews.title: Oddly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how or why but this stuff makes my skin look amazing. I spray it on after washing my face AM and PM, let it dry naturally and then proceed with my normal skincare routine. I discovered it while researching products for Psoriasis and sensitive skin. My Psoriasis cleared up after using Squaline, Medical Grade Skin Barrier and Oil Cleanser. But this seemed to clear up the Psoriasis on my scalp where I really couldn't use the other products. It is a very large bottle so I expect it will last a long time with just a spritz in the AM and PM.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: It is one ingredient-water! That’s it! Absolutely doesn’t “soften” skin. I thought there were other ingredients, but nope-water! And water is a drying agent to skin! Also, the spray is too wide and goes everywhere when sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Helps Keratosis Pilaris.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing a tumblr post by "goddeer" and how it helped her eczema. I have eczema and keratosis Pilaris and let me tell you... This stuff WORKS! My eczema cleared and my KP went from the color of sunburn to pale pink. Nothing has ever helped with my KP before. I will be buying again. If you have either skin conditions, try it. You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: K.Tak

customer_reviews.title: Skincare MUST HAVE !
customer_reviews.text: i learned about this product while traveling in Singapore. I always visit foreign pharmacies when traveling abroad . Guardian and Watson are the best Asian ones . I noticed that the masses were buying this product in Costco bulk quantities . so i asked about it ! has multiple uses : psoriasis, eczema , sunburns , skin irritation and daily cleaning . i bought two small travel sizes . I take long flights often and have used Evian spray during flight but this product feels much better ! im so happy i could find this spray in usa . thanks Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: misslee

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Itchy skin!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I love Evian spray and thought this would be even better! I don't know if it's counterfiet or what but it makes my skin worse when I use it. In fact my skin is definitely dryer on the days I use it. If my skin is sensitive after a facial or exfoliation - this 'water' stings like salt water and makes me itch. It's not a fine mist so I can't even use it to set my makeup. When I love a product it gets used a lot. This stuff just sits around collecting dust - I'll probably use it on my house plants.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first, but now I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because let’s be honest, it sounds like snake oil... it’s fancy French spring water in an aerosol can. But, I really do love this spray! I purchased when an at-home facial wax went terribly wrong (I pulled off patches of skin from my face, ouch!!) and an online article recommended this product as part of the solution to keep skin moisturized while it recovered. I’m not sure if it’s magic or what, but this product really helped - I healed in 3 days or less. Additionally, the mist is so refreshing! Now that I’m healed, I’m hooked and use this in my regimen day and night to refresh and moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This mist isn't everything I hoped for but it certainly packs a punch. My skin is definitely clearer and softer when I use it. When my skin feels burny, itchy, or bumpy, this spray cures it all. I know I haven't used it when my skin isn't as clear. It takes a couple days to kick in but even if you only use it once a day, you'll see a difference. For the best results, I definitely use several times a day, usually four (morning/evening plus two more times). It provides some instant relief but for the most part, takes time to work.
customer_reviews.author: Eternity Seraph

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for keeping my skin moist. I also use it before or after I apply product to my face to get a deeper rub in. It’s a great price. I recently moved from Florida, where my skin stayed moist from the humidity, to southern CA, where it’s dry. Keeping skin moist keeps the wrinkle look down. I’m 59 so this is an important part of my anti-aging regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Abundance

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought the reviews were fake. But considering how sensitive and jacked my skin had become due to meds prescribed by a dermatologist, I was desperate. In addition, I had these dark patches on my cheeks and forehead because the meds, pretty much burned my skin. This miracle water in a can is just that..A miracle. I can still see the dark patches, but they are slowly being healed. I use it after I cleanse my skin, and sometimes during the day when those areas become irritated. My skin no longer looks dry and cracked but moisturized. I will forever keep this product on hand as long as it is in production.
customer_reviews.author: writingbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s a can of water but listen...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I got it for my mother to try. She’s a school bus driver and they don’t have AC on the buses. She loves it!!! She’s able to spray herself down between stops when she’s feeling hot and sticky. I got myself a can because she loved it so much. It sprays a fine mist and evaporates quickly and leaves you feeling refreshed and moisturized but not greasy and can be used over makeup. My mother has since ordered 6 more cans for other women she works with.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good product but amazon plays games with price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I totally love it but I’m disappointed by price games Amazon plays. I purchased it for $18.50 on April 3rd and noticed that the price dropped by $4 not even 2 weeks later. Seriously?! So not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Notice difference - even tone smaller pores
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with breakouts and splotchy skin - I use vitamin C serum and essential oils with good success but after reading about this I gave it a try - after washing my face am and pm (am I only use water no cleanser)- I spray this on then add vit c serum and essential oils- after just a week of use I notice my skin seems more even toned - pores seem smaller - pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Acurti

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to hate it, but I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: I got the 10 oz version because that seemed to be the most bang for your buck. I really wanted to hate this product because I swore I would NOT be one of those people that sprays their face with water. Now I'm converted. I will say that my skin feels softer when I use it. It feels really soothing and refreshing to spray this at night before I start layering on serums. I got the 10 oz version because that seemed to be the most bang for your buck. It's by no mean "essential" to my routine, but I really enjoy using it and how it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Akash B

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in hives
customer_reviews.text: Caused my toddler to break out in hives and itch all over and cry!! I had to wash him immediately after applying some on him and put steroid cream all over , and give Benadryl. I don’t recommend this for eczema!! I wish I could get a refund but amazon won’t let you with aerosol canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Recommend and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have very sensitive skin and rosacea. So, even after a gentle cleanse my skin still become irritated. I use this every time I cleanse my face. I also use it before bed for that supper yummy feeling it gives the skin. There is no scent. Just a light cool mist. Great product. Excellent quality. Reasonably priced. This is a pretty big can. Will continue to purchase this product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Yassine

customer_reviews.title: This is a staple for me! If you wear makeup, you need this
customer_reviews.text: I can't find this item in drug stores anymore so I was happy to find it on Amazon! I use this before I put on my moisturizer and again when I'm finished to settle down any power on my face. I also will spray this on my face during the day just to freshen up my makeup. It's a really great product!
customer_reviews.author: The Red Headed Step Child

customer_reviews.title: changed my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I was one of those people who thought, why am i paying so much for water until i got super dry, red, and itchy skin around my nose and chin. I used their tolerance cream which i recommend and this together, and wow it changed my skin within days. Its refreshing and moisturizing. I use it over my makeup sometimes and it does ruin it. This product comes out in a fine mist and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a fake?  Did not work like previous product.
customer_reviews.text: I think this might be a fake Avene product. I had a small sample bottle of this for years and finally discovered recently that it was a miracle for keeping little babies cool on hot summer days. So I ordered this larger bottle. I was first disappointed that it didn't seem to come out cool as the first bottle did. Then, after a couple of weeks, the bottle started leaking under the nozzle. $12.00 of worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: What is this sorcery???
customer_reviews.text: Ummm... so it’s water but better. I suffer from eczema and have a hard time with the itchiness and burning. I sprayed some of this on my arm and ummm... the itching and burning was gone within seconds. There has so be some sorcery involved because this stuff is magical. I use it faithfully anytime I am suffering or if I’m feeling fancy I’ll spray it on my face as a refresher.
customer_reviews.author: Chianta Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Soothe Irritated Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermal water spray! It is a deceptively good product. When I first heard about this spray I honestly thought it was a waste of money, but it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. I find the spray to be super soothing and a good way to provide additional moisture between steps of my skincare routine. I also love to use it if my skin is feeling flushed or irritated from the sun. This has been a game changer, especially as someone who recently started using Tretinoin.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective hydration
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I could use to wash my face when I got perioral dermatitis and it was wonderful! I love the cooling feeling of the mist each morning and night, then I simply wipe away with a cotton ball. Also have a travel size Avene that I kept in the cooler when visiting western U.S. deserts in the summertime - amazing for both cooling and keeping skin hydrated. Only product of its kind... Simple and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Sellerocity - Dawn & George

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a lifesaver for sensitive skin! It calms my skin down a lot when it has redness and dryness. Helps with itching as well! Super moisturizing and is great over makeup and on top of makeup too! I am buying the full size.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with a dermatitis outbreak on my chest. I have prescription Cortizone cream but it just wasn’t helping. It would clear up and be back the next day. I started spraying on this French water and my skin cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gay Norris

customer_reviews.title: The best thermal water there is
customer_reviews.text: This water is great for calming rosacea and any other kind of irritated skin. I have extremely sensitive skin that does not tolerate many products. For years, i have used this daily under Shea butter or squlene for moisturizer. It is expensive and I have tried replacing it with other waters... They never worked for me the way this one does. There really is something different about it that is worth the money. It keeps my skin calm and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I've used product for years. Only ordering here i have received faulty nozzle, twice. I would't purchase again. I think there is a quality issue on the 5oz size.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: The spray nozzle randomly stops working.
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product so I purchased it. But I have half a bottle left and the spray nozzle stopped working. Supposedly this is typical for this product if it’s shaken, but I haven’t shaken it or traveled with it. It’s unfortunate, but I’ll have to switch to Evian. I’d rather spend my money on a product that I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally trying!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical to try at first because I thought it was just a water in a bottle so why spend so much money on it. But because I was suffering so badly recently with my eczema flare ups that comes and goes I was willing to try anything. It definitely kept my dry patches moisturized throughout the day which I had a problem with and thats what makes me keep scratching! Anyway bought a second bottle the next day I used it cuz I never want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Instantly Refreshes Face Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! And I’ve only used it a week. I was in search of an eye cream for sensitive eye lids and found the product by this brand. It is also great. My eyes can not tolerate most eye creams. I saw this water in the other products and read the reviews which convinced me to try it. I spray my face in the morning after shower and again after I wash my face at night. My skin is instantly restored and refreshed! Just try it. I love it enough to sit down and type this for you. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It's just water guys.
customer_reviews.text: It's literally just water with a nice nozzle to spray a fine mist on your face. It feels great when you're hot AF. Other than that, it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: packaging was secure...didnt receive broken cap or anything like some other reviews..ok..ive had some fancy brand facial mists/waters/whatever....but this one actually seems like....water??? lol a better kind tho....its refreshing, not sticky, a continuous spray nozzle, smells like water....not some fragranced mess. I like it.. so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Prettygirl901

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff! I know that spending money on facial water sounds odd to some but this is not just regular water, it has really benefited my skin. I like to use it after cleansing and before putting on moisturizer. Any good skin care expert knows it's best to apply moisturizer to damp skin as it absorbs better and locks in the moisture. This stuff is perfect for the purpose of dampening skin before applying moisturizer. I also take this on vacation with me and keep it in a fridge for days I am at the beach, it feels great on the skin after a long day of sun and ocean water. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AIBKRM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped spraying , but really good product
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size worked better, the large one quit spraying and there is at least 1/2 the fluid let in it. So I’ll buy the smaller size and hope it works like the first one I used. It’s amazing for irritated and itchy skin. The skin was super itchy and red around my nose and the dr just said that’s how is going to be but this fixes it !
customer_reviews.author: Linley

customer_reviews.title: I'LL NEVER GO BACK TO ANYOTHER SPRAY
customer_reviews.text: the ingredients say it all.... perfect for my dry, acne and sensitive skin... Im a huge facial spray fan but not a fan of fragrance or other toxic ingredients... Found my holy grail
customer_reviews.author: Linda Camarillo

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say I have noticed big changes with my skin but I will not deny how refreshing it is.. it’s super pricey but I think it’s gunna last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bottelberghe

customer_reviews.title: Spray your face. It feels great!
customer_reviews.text: It is quite refreshing. I keep a bottle on my desk at work and spray myself in the face from time to time. Not only does it wake me up, but it seems to make my face feel refreshed and moisturized even though I know it's just water. It produces a super fine mist which is just lovely. It is also quite smart to spray your face with this before you put on any kind of lotion or foundation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fovall

customer_reviews.title: Fountain of youth in a can
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t imagine that a mist of “water” could make such a difference but I have really noticed an improvement in my skin’s texture after using this spray for about a month. It’s more porcelain like. I will mist my face before going to bed and then apply a light moisturizer over it. In the mornings I will mist before applying makeup and once after to set it. Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I have struggled with acne for the last few years (I’m 31). Always spending so much money on different products. I use the thermal spray at least twice a day. It’s perfect for my sensitive skin and doesn’t make me break out. I am never afraid of over usage. Makes my skin look refreshed and hydrated! I don’t go on a trip without my travel size!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Doherty

customer_reviews.title: So AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this product! Stop reading this review and buy now! :) Your skin will THANK YOU! I like to place my 5 oz bottle in my purse for on the go refreshment and my big bottle is in the fridge for that extra "ahhhhhhhhhh" effect 😁😍 This is worth the splurge! 💦💦💦💦💦
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: This spray mist feels good on your face.
customer_reviews.text: After I use the Avene facial moisturizer masque, I spray my face with this thermal spring water. It is a fine mist spray, very soothing. Then I wash the masque off my face. Also, just for a refreshing feeling, I may spray my face with this spring water.
customer_reviews.author: An older woman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT MINUSCULE SPRAY THAT KEEPS YOU COOL!
customer_reviews.text: SUCH A FINITE SPRAY THAT COOLS YET DOES NOT INTERFERE WITH MAKEUP. HARD TO FIND, BUT LEARNED ABOUT IT IN PARIS, FRANCE.
customer_reviews.author: Wine Babe

customer_reviews.title: Cools your skin and feels smooth
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this in my Allure beauty box but bought more because I fell in love with it. I have rosacea and sometimes it flares so bad my skin looks burned. Now this does not cure this of course, but it helps cool it off and calm it down. No scent, does not irritate my skin and makes it fell moisturized and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was not completely filled
customer_reviews.text: I received my regular sized bottle yesterday & it is not even filled all the way. It barely has anything in it at all & “may” last me a week. I am so disappointed because there are not any returns or refunds. A waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha H.

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this again.....Seems to work well except it is not even half gone and it is running out of spray power.....It spits a spews and the mist isn't light anymore....A waste of money....OR maybe I just got a DUD! IDK
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: So refreshing and perfect for sensitive skin! I love using this in the summer to freshen up and even in the winter when I need an extra boost at night. I also love using this as a quasi-moisturizer when my skin is acting out. Not sure if it qualifies as a moisturizer but it seems to help when your skin just needs a break.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and addictive
customer_reviews.text: I thought this seems like a useless product but it is a little addictive! It feels incredibly refreshing. I spray it on after my makeup, after a facial, if my skin is dry, if I’m hot if I’m stressed. I will probably always keep one of these on hand. I take it with me out of town as well. Great after a plane ride
customer_reviews.author: Providence Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Just water.
customer_reviews.text: There are supposedly all these health benefits to this, especially if you look around online for blog posts purporting that this is basically miracle water. It ended up drying out my dry skin even more, so I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Yesss honey
customer_reviews.text: Girl, let me tell you. This stuff is it! I’ve suffered from ace to cystic acne for years and I finally found a routine that works for me. I wash my face with JUST make up wipes and water, then spray my face with this amazing stuff. I’m thinking all the different products with a bunch of ingredients really irritated my face but this stuff is natural and feels great on your face. It’s refreshing and it leaves you feeling like a million bucks. I love it and it’s the only thing I’ll ever use.
customer_reviews.author: CoconutKeilani

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and invigorating
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. I keep it in my refrigerator for maximum effect. I use it after working out, when the temperature is too high/dry due to thermostat setting, when sitting for a long time in front of the computer, at the pool/beach, on airplanes, etc. It is a fantastic relief and I take it with me everywhere I go. The travel size is too expensive but now I can't do without it.
customer_reviews.author: E M R

customer_reviews.title: Calms irritated skin
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from eczema that flares up every now and then. I love that this product calms down my irritated skin. I also find that if I spray this first and then follow up with a gentle moisurizer, my skin seem to stay happy longer without feeling dry or itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun L.

customer_reviews.title: It's just water...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would work because the high ratings, but it didn't really do anything. It's spring water so thats cool, but the ingredients literally say water and nitrogen. If anything I think its just a placebo effect. It feels good on a hot day, but it really doesn't have much to offer. I might as well put an Ozarka water bottle in a spray bottle. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I didn’t try and start to use this until after the return window had closed. The nozzle worked for about a week (2-3 uses) but quit soon after. Was always stored in a drawer with the protective lid on. Could have been just one of those things, but make sure to check yours as soon as it’s delivered so you don’t get stuck with a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Seems dumb but is nice
customer_reviews.text: This seems so stupid because it's just water but it's the BEST way to wake up. I hardly sleep since I have a 5 month old so I feel very groggy in the morning but this stuff does the trick. It doesn't make my skin clear but I have already purchased two bottles in the last few months because it's become part of my morning ritual.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Super fine hydrating mist..
customer_reviews.text: This water spray can is so much more. The fine water mist particles will drench your skin leaving it with the most refreshing feeling. So whether you have sensitive skin, mild irritation or just been in the sun too long, this is a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: hennessey bounds

customer_reviews.title: Magic water
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what the heck this stuff is, but IT WORKS! I use this at the ballpark just before I’m about to pass out from heat exhaustion and bam, it brings me back to life. It’s like a shot of air conditioning or something. I don’t know. I really don’t. But it makes my face feel calm and cool, so I’ll keep buying
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water for misting my face. After I mist my face, I then put my moisturizer on. The mist is fine and feels so good when you spray it on. I will purchase again when needed. This is also great for misting your skin after putting makeup on, especially mineral based makeup. It gives your skin a glow and sets the makeup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Conaghan

customer_reviews.title: It’s Awesome ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and works well especially in the heat! feels fabulous, and most important is that it doesn’t irritate my skin. I use it to cool off or set my make up. The spray nozzle always works. It’s a good quality product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Like washing your face
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but I love this stuff. When I was younger I had perfect skin because I didn't wear makeup yet and Everytime I washed my hands I'd splash water on my face. Now that I wear makeup I spray some of this when I wash my hands because I missed how fresh my face used to feel. I keep it in the bathroom by the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: A summer essential
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to the beach and pool and I spray my face after swimming and tanning . It’s such a great pick me up . I put it in the fridge before I leave and store it in my cooler . I also bring it in my purse when I go out
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Broke.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but DONT BUY THIS BOTTLE the nozzle broke and now I just have a bunch of product I can use
customer_reviews.author: Tess Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The Spray Nozzle Stops Working-Never Buying Again-See Video
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time I have bought this products and I am done. The spray nozzle with just get clogged--see attached video--when there is still a good amount of water left. It is horrible and I am done..I also didn't think it moisturized my face that well, the water dried on my face very quickly, by the time I left my bedroom after I sprayed it, my face was just as dry...I am searching for another product...
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!I use it two or three times a day. Makes my skin feel so good and I just love the cooling effect. I use over my makeup when I feel I want a pick me up and it’s so refreshing my skin is already in good condition. It feels so moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Water hose anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this product but I didn’t. It’s sprayed too violently on my face! Felt like a water hose hitting me. Amazon was nice enough to send me a return payment. Maybe I just got a bunk bottle?? not sure. But I will be trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: A.N. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: A must have !
customer_reviews.text: I have to have this product on my sink! Good for a Refresh and to dampen skin without stickiness or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Works On Irritation And Burn Pain
customer_reviews.text: I had irritation from my underwire bra at the end of every day- my skin would stay red all night. I sprayed this on it, and it immediately felt better, and the redness went away in 30 minutes. My mom burnt her hand and used this, and said it didn’t stop a blister, but helped the pain a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Received as a sample in a subscription box at first. Had to buy it again because I fell in love with it! I use it to set my powder makeup too.I have VERY dry skin and this helps a ton! Keep it with me during the summer as well as winter. This can will be your best friend during the summer especially at the zoo!!
customer_reviews.author: nicnacs, nicnacs

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to my friends with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this spring water product to my friends. I have sensitive skin and my skin could not accept most of skin care products. But this is the only some that are suitable for me. I continue to order it every month!!
customer_reviews.author: Leyi

customer_reviews.title: Best results out of every product in 13 years
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time a product we tried on my 13year old worked! She has both severe eczema, keratosis Polaris, and just sensitive skin in general. Within 30 min we started seeing the red fade. She used it every other day for a week and for the first in years she said she didnt feel the need to wear a sweater. The only thing she told me to mention was that it did sting a time bit on the area the skin was broken from scratching. We will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Evian is better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly don’t see much of a difference using this product. Bought this and the Evian. Noticed that the spray from the Evian is much finer of a mist. So between the two the Evian is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Rosacea SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Okay I was super hesitant to buy this because it’s essentially water...in a can...... BUT I get really bad flushing on my nose and under my eyes from my rosacea and when I put this on OMG it’s such a relief... idk why this works but it does and im hooked. It’s obviously not a cure but it really helps make my flushing less irritating and really calms my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bek

customer_reviews.title: Literally cannot live without this stuff now. It keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally cannot live without this stuff now. It keeps my sensitive skin fresh and moisturized. It's helped the redness from my rosacea immensely. I spritz several times a day, even over makeup. It keeps my skin looking fresh and dewey. I just bought travel sized to take with me on trips.
customer_reviews.author: halah

customer_reviews.title: Literally Miraculous Results
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had horrific eczema on her hands and arms. Nothing helped, including prescriptions from the dermatologist. We tried this product on a whim after seeing it on Pinterest. She uses the Thermal spray along with the Avenue Xera bar soap ( not available on Amazon) and the results have been miraculous! Very thankful for this find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years, very soothing and it calms your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i wont lie, i spray this all over my ...
customer_reviews.text: i wont lie, i spray this all over my face and know its just water but its magical water with a $$ price.
customer_reviews.author: Nhung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small sample bottle from A subscription and was excited to find a large bottle on amazon. It is so refreshing on my sensitive skin! The spray comes out as a light cool mist. I use it when outside on hot days and also use it as a conductor for when I use my microcurrent device.
customer_reviews.author: FoxShe

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 10+ years and it never disappoints. Very calming to the skin. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Meh?
customer_reviews.text: I know people rave about this product- but it's literally just water in a aerosol can. It's okay, but nothing amazing. I have dry sensitive skin, btw.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I just got it today, OMG, the cover was broke when I opened the box. Hope it works well
customer_reviews.author: jieyi

customer_reviews.title: Very cooling
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this because I saw several YouTubers use it, everyone claimed it was refreshing and soothing and moisturizing and I wanted to try it for myself. It has become part of my skincare routine applying it after moisturizer and it makes my skin feel exactly how everyone claimed, it gives a pleasant cooling feel. Instructions say to pat dry after a few minutes but I don't, I leave it on until it dries and it really helps me relax at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Selene

customer_reviews.title: Five star!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. No scent, good for sensitive skins. This is the second time I bought the item. I got one in the first purchase. I got two for this second purchase. Going to come back later.
customer_reviews.author: DarkistVoid

customer_reviews.title: I ordered water in a can. that's what I got!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's water. In a can. And the spray is very gentle. I use this before moisturizer and it really helps to keep my skin soft and hydrated. Good stuff! If you want water in a can to spray at your patches face, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Milk Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Relieve sensitive skin : )
customer_reviews.text: I belong to a sensitive skin type. When the season changes, my face will be red and swollen and itchy due to allergies. I love this product, which effectively relieves my skin sensitivity.: )
customer_reviews.author: JX

customer_reviews.title: So much better for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed this, but now I will be buying again! I used to use some face mist with all these botanics and stuff, but I felt like it was slightly irritating. This spray can feels good, really good. I use it before my face oil and sometimes before foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great item, I will buy again but it get damage during shipping
customer_reviews.text: I just being using it for 2 day now. So far so Good. I brought it for my dry skin do to the cold weather. It is great. I think it will be even better on summer time because it is very refreshing. Only problem is the bottom is damage when it ship to me
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to my face care. I don't like scented products so this one is perfect. It hydrates my face and leaves it smooth and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Gaudy Batres

customer_reviews.title: Important first step to apply to your skin
customer_reviews.text: Discover this water last summer visiting my sisters in Quebec, perfect for my morning wake-up... So good for skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: So soothing for rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in purse for my face when overheated or something triggers my rosacea. It’s super soothing and provides relief from rosacea flares and/or hot flashes
customer_reviews.author: coloradomomma

customer_reviews.title: Avene Thermal Spring Water
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, love all Avene products. This mist is so fine and so refreshing!! I even use it as a setting spray for my mineral powder foundation. I have oily/combination sensitive skin and Avene products are so perfect for my daily regime.
customer_reviews.author: MoDi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mist for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My skincare staple. I use this day and night after washing my face. It’s refreshing and I am addicted, I’ve tried other facial mist sprays like Evian, La Roche, but I always end up coming back to Avene Great for people with perioral dermatitis, this keeps my flare ups under control and helps with stinging!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Spray stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and bought for daughter and myself, but feel it was a rip off. When about 1/2 was left, the spray stopped working. So, really did not get money’s worth and too late to return. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Toner and Calming for Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years as a toner. The mineral water has a calming effect that keeps my Rosacea at bay and its the perfect moisturizing spritz before applying creams. It is very gentle and has no scent. Also great to take on airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Big bottle. Nice fine mist. Face looking too powdery after applying makeup? "Hold my beer." Great to spray on immediately prior to a hydrator when face is still wet (especially hyaluronic acid) to lock some h20 in there. Would tap water do the same thing? Probably, but this may actually be more soothing (jury is out) plus it's from France therefor far more luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t think of a single complaint about this product. I’m working outside daily in the sun and in the west, where it is super dry. It makes my skin feel so much better. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those dry days.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this spray to set my makeup for the day and it always worked great. Fast forward many years later and I felt dry all over. I rememberd using this and so I ordered it here and I have to say it does the job and quenches that dry air/skin feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Detisch

product_meta.title: Eau Thermale Avene Thermal Spring Water
product_meta.description:
Size:300 ml / 10.58 OunceThermal Spring Water is the key ingredient of all Avène skin care products. It infuses the skin with hydrating, soothing antioxidant water. Alleviates redness and irritation associated with psoriasis, eczema, and rosacea. Use as a facial mist to calm skin after shaving, where there's burning, stinging or after irritating dermatological procedures. Provides antioxidant protection with an optimal calcium/magnesium ratio. Ideal for use after exercise or during travel for a soothing, perk-up. Safe for infants, children and adults. Rooted in dermatology and hydrotherapy, Avène has over 270 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is trusted by millions. Its core ingredient, Avène Thermal Spring Water, soothes and helps minimize skin sensitivity. Use as often as necessary.

BRAND STORY
Rooted in dermatology and hydrotherapy, Avène has over 270 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is trusted by millions. Its core ingredient, Avène Thermal Spring Water, soothes and helps minimize skin sensitivity.

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
